description: This file contains test cases for the 'Agent' class interacting with the 'Claude' model, including synchronous and asynchronous tests, memory handling, structured output, JSON mode, and history management.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model for structured movie script data with title, genre, and plot fields.

methods.name: _assert_metrics
methods.description: A helper function to verify that the metrics in the response contain positive token counts and that total tokens equal the sum of input and output tokens.

methods.name: test_basic
methods.description: Tests the basic synchronous run of the Agent with the Claude model.

methods.name: test_basic_stream
methods.description: Tests the streaming response of the Agent.

methods.name: test_async_basic
methods.description: Tests the asynchronous run of the Agent.

methods.name: test_async_basic_stream
methods.description: Tests the asynchronous streaming response of the Agent.

methods.name: test_with_memory
methods.description: Tests the Agent's memory feature with history tracking.

methods.name: test_structured_output
methods.description: Tests the Agent's ability to produce structured output conforming to the MovieScript model.

methods.name: test_json_response_mode
methods.description: Tests the Agent's JSON response mode with the MovieScript model.

methods.name: test_history
methods.description: Tests the history management and message session persistence in the Agent.
